$comment: This is the JSON Schema for a blueprint file that is used to determine the shape of the configuration for a mod that uses MCM.

SchemaVersion.description: The version of the MCM schema that this file uses. This is used to ensure that the file is compatible with the version of MCM that is being used. DO NOT CHANGE THIS VALUE unless you know what you are doing; use whatever version that comes with the schema file for the MCM version that you are using/building for.

ModName.description: The name of the mod to use instead of its registered name. This can be useful for mods that have registered names that are not properly formatted or for mods that have multiple names due to multiple versions.

Tabs.description: The tabs that will be displayed in the MCM menu. Each tab can contain either sections or settings, but not both. Tabs are displayed in the order that they are defined in this file, in the top section of MCM's ImGui window.

Settings.description: The list of sections to be displayed outside of any tabs in the MCM menu. It is advised to use tabs and sections instead of this list, as this can lead to an unorganized MCM menu.

Tab.description: A single tab in the MCM menu.

TabName.description: The name of the tab that will be displayed in the MCM menu, on the tab's button. Will be localized if a handle is provided.

TabId.description: The unique identifier for the tab. This value should be unique across all tabs in the settings file.

TabDescription.description: The description of the tab that will be displayed in the MCM menu. Will be localized if a handle is provided.
TabDescription.$comment: This might not be used at all, but it's here just in case.

Sections.description: The sections that will be displayed within the tab. They provide a distinct visual separation in the MCM menu, with headers and optional descriptions.

Settings.description: The settings that will be displayed within the tab.

Handles.description: Handles to localize the tab's strings.

Id.description: The unique identifier for the setting, used to identify the setting in the code for both MCM and the mod consuming the API. This will be displayed in the settings file, so it still should be human-readable and descriptive.

Name.description: The name of the setting as it will be displayed in the MCM menu. Will be localized if a handle is provided.

Type.description: The type of the setting, which determines which ImGui widget will be displayed in the MCM menu.

Default.description: The default value of the setting. It will be used for initialization and as a fallback if the setting is not found or is invalid in the settings file.

Tooltip.description: The tooltip that will be displayed when the user hovers over the setting in the MCM menu. Will be localized if a handle is provided.

Description.description: The description of the setting that will be displayed as text next to the ImGui widget in the MCM menu. Will be localized if a handle is provided.

Choices.description: The available set of choices for the setting, used for enum and radio types.

Min.description: The minimum value for the setting, used for slider type.

Max.description: The maximum value for the setting, used for slider type.

Options.description: Additional options for the setting, depending on its type (e.g. choices for enum and radio types, min and max for slider type). Will be localized if handles are provided.

Handles.description: Handles to localize the setting's strings.

Setting.description: A single setting in the MCM menu.

SectionId.description: The unique identifier for the section. This value should be unique across all sections in the settings file.

SectionName.description: The name of the section that will be displayed as a header in the MCM menu. Will be localized if a handle is provided.

Settings.description: The settings that will be displayed within the section.

Handles.description: Handles to localize the section's strings.

Section.description: A section within a tab in the MCM menu.

NameHandle.description: The handle to be used to localize the name of the tab.

DescriptionHandle.description: The handle to be used to localize the description of the tab.

TabHandles.description: Handles that can be used to localize tab strings.

NameHandle.description: The handle to be used to localize the name of the section.

SectionHandles.description: A list of handles that can be used to localize a section.

NameHandle.description: The handle to be used to localize the name of the setting.

DescriptionHandle.description: The handle to be used to localize the description of the setting.

TooltipHandle.description: The handle to be used to localize the tooltip of the setting.

ChoicesHandles.description: Handles that can be used to localize choices for the setting.

SettingHandles.description: Handles that can be used to localize a setting.
